name: DisplayWrite Document
summary: Learn about .DCA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: DisplayWrite documents also use the .RFT file extension.
NOTE: Advanced Computer Innovations WordPort is discontinued and no longer available for download.

description: Text document created by DisplayWrite, an old word processor for IBM PCs that has been discontinued; saves document text and basic formatting; can be converted to more recent word processing formats using WordPort.
